Questions.QuestionString: The APU air intake actuator maneuvers the intake flap between how many positions?
Answers: 2: Open and Closed.
3: fully Open, partially open, Closed.
3: Open(open in flight), Open( open on Ground), Closed.

Questions.QuestionString: what is the type of air intake flap actuator:
Answers: hydraulic actuator
electro-mechanical
hdro - mechanical

Answers: Inlet guide Valve IGV, Surge control valve
bleed valve, air cooling valve , Surge control valve
Inlet guide Valve IGV , bleed valve, Surge control valve

Answers: crank thong qua starter generator start
crank thong qua crank pad on air/oil separator
crank through OMT

venturi effect generated by the exhaust gas.

Questions.QuestionString: The APU oil cooler reduces the oil temperature using air:

Sucked with aventuri effect generated by the exhaust gas.
Tapped from outlet of Load compressor.

Questions.QuestionString: What type of APU bleed valve :
Answers: flap valve type, supplied by high pressure fuel and is controlled by a solenoid
ball valve, van hanh fuse, control bang torque motor
flap valve, supplied by air  and is controlled by a solenoid

Answers: left side
right side

Questions.QuestionString: What is true regarding the APU Starter/Generator supply?
Answers: 90 KVA , 115 VAC.
120 KVA, 115 VAC.
150KVA, 230 VAC.

Questions.QuestionString: From where is the APU emergency shutdown can be manually initiated?
Answers: Cockpit Overhead Panel, EXT PWR Receptacle, Integrated Refuel Panel.
Cockpit Overhead Panel, NLG Services Panel, Integrated Refuel Panel.
Cockpit Overhead Panel, NLG Services Panel, EXT PWR Receptacle.

Questions.QuestionString: Which condition APU start in flight:
Answers: TEFO
total hydraulic system inop
not been inhibited via CMS and TEFO

Questions.QuestionString: What is true regarding APU maintenance?
Answers: You could swap DMMs between APUs for trouble shooting.
You could replace DMM and ECB at the same time.
You could replace DMM with new one.

Questions.QuestionString: How is the APU oil cooled?
Answers: By air supplied by cooling fan driven by gearbox.
By air sucked with a venturi effect generated by the exhaust gas.
By air routed from outlet of Load compressor.

Questions.QuestionString: Which components of APU are actuated with fuel medium?
Answers: IGV actuator, Surge Control Valve actuator.
IGV actuator, Bleed Control Valve actuator.
IGV actuator, Bleed Control Valve actuator and Surge Control Valve actuator.

Questions.QuestionString: Modules of the APU HGT-1700[A] are:
Answers: The Accessory Gearbox,  One stage Load Compressor, two stage axial engine compressor driven by three stage engine centrifugal turbine.
The Accessory Gearbox,  One stage Load Compressor and two stage centrifugal engine compressor driven by three stage engine axial turbine.
The Accessory Gearbox,  One stage Load Compressor, one stage axial engine compressor driven by three stage engine centrifugal turbine.

Questions.QuestionString: How is the APU fixed to the aircraft’s structure?
Answers: By 3 mounts.
By 4 mounts.
By 5 mounts.

Questions.QuestionString: In case  of the air intake flap actuator failure:
Answers: You must declare the APU as inoperative.
You can de-activate the intake flap in open position and continues the APU using within limit time.
You can de-activate the intake flap in close position and continues the APU using within limit time.

Questions.QuestionString: What kind of electric power does the Starter Generator Control Unit( SGCU) use to start the APU?
Answers: AC power from the aircraft busses.
DC power from aircraft busses.
AC or DC power from aircraft busses.

Questions.QuestionString: What is true regarding the APU Starter/Generator supply?
Answers: Fixed frequency ,150 KVA , 230 VAC.
Fixed frequency ,100 KVA , 115 VAC.
Variable frequency ,150 KVA , 230 VAC.

Questions.QuestionString: How is the APU Starter/Generator( SG) cooled and lubricated ?
Answers: By its own oil system.
By the APU fuel system.
By the APU oil system.

Questions.QuestionString: The APU Start Power Unit( SPU) :
Answers: Converts 230VAC to 115VAC voltage to supply the SGCU for APU start.
Converts 28VDC to a high DC voltage to supply the SGCU for APU start.
Converts 115VAC to 230VAC voltage to supply the SGCU for APU start.

Questions.QuestionString: What is duty cycle of the APU Starter/Generator?
Answers: 2 attempted starts maximum in any case, then a 1 hour cool down period is required prior to the next attempted start.
3 attempted starts , a 30 second delay between them, then a 1 hour cool down period is required prior to the next attempted start.
4 attempted starts maximum, then trouble shooting if  the last attempt is not successful.

Questions.QuestionString: In case of emergency the APU can be shutdown from:
Answers: Fuel control panel, EXT PWR Receptacle, Integrated Refuel Panel.
Cockpit Overhead Panel, NLG Services Panel, EXT PWR Receptacle.
Fire control panel, NLG Services Panel, Integrated Refuel Panel.

Questions.QuestionString: What is true regarding the APU start modes?
Answers: There is no automatic start mode.
Auto start is initiated by ECB automatically in case of Total Engine Flame Out (TEFO) in flight.
The ECB can initiated the APU auto or manual start mode on ground.

Questions.QuestionString: If APU Data Memory Module (DMM) shows problems :
Answers: You could swap DMMs between APUs for trouble shooting.
You have to try with new one.
You could try with used serviceable DMM.

1 stage Load Compressor , 2 stage engine compressor, 1 engine turbine and Accessory Gearbox .

5 mounts.

Shared with APU fuel system.

Answers: 2 attempted starts maximum in any case, then a 1 hour cool down period is required prior to the next attempted start.
3 attempted starts , a 30 second delay between them, then a 1 hour cool down period is required prior to the next attempted start.
4 attempted starts totally, then trouble shooting if the last attempt is not successful.

Auto start is initiated by ECB automatically in case of In flight Total Engine Flame Out (TEFO).

1 stage Load Compressor , 3 stage engine compressor ,2 stage engine turbine and Accessory Gearbox .
1 stage Load Compressor , 2 stage engine compressor, 1 engine turbine and Accessory Gearbox .

Position feed back from RVDT.
Position feed back from internal switches.

Questions.QuestionString: What is the function of The APU Start Power Unit(SPU) ?
Answers: It converts 230VAC to 115VAC voltage to supply the SGCU for APU start.
It converts 28VDC to a high DC voltage to supply the SGCU for APU start.
It converts 115VAC to 230VAC voltage to supply the SGCU for APU start.

Answers: 2 attempted starts maximum in any case, then a 1 hour cool down period is required prior to the next attempted start.
3 attempted starts , a 30 second delay between them, then a 1 hour cool down period is required prior to the next attempted start.
4 attempted starts totally, then trouble shooting if the last attempt is not successful.

Answers: Forward Avionic compartment.
Aft cargo compartment.
Rearward of bulk cargo compartment.

Questions.QuestionString: When is the ECB powered?
Answers: The A/C is energized.
The A/C is energized and Master switch “On”.
The A/C is energized from the external power cart.

Auto start is initiated by ECB automatically in case of In flight Total Engine Flame Out (TEFO).
APU can be auto or manual start on ground.

In the event of coming fuel pressure lower than limit.
In the event of anoil level lower than limit.

Questions.QuestionString: When lube filter or SG scavenge filter is clogged:
Answers: The APU will shutdown automatically in any case.
The APU will shutdown automatically if in flight.
The APU will shutdown automatically if on ground.

Questions.QuestionString: The APU oil cooler reduces the oil temperature using air:
Answers: Supplied by cooling fan driven by gearbox.
Sucked with aventuri effect generated by the exhaust gas.
Tapped from outlet of Load compressor.

Questions.QuestionString: The function of the thermostat bypass valve of the APU oil system is:
Answers: Allowing the oil to bypass the oil cooler if oil temperature is too cold.
Allowing the oil to bypass the oil cooler if it clogs.
Allowing the oil to bypass the oil cooler if it clogs or oil temperature is too cold.

Questions.QuestionString: If the advisory‘OIL LVL LO’ is pulsing on APU page:
Answers: It means low oil level condition.
The APU canstill  operate for another 60hours at normal oil consumption.
It means the oil level to be checked.

Questions.QuestionString: In case of high oil temperature or low oil pressure:
Answers: The ECB will generate the maintenance message.
The APU will shutdown automatically.
ECB automatically aborts the start sequence.

Questions.QuestionString: How do you perform the APU manual rotation?
Answers: By removal of IGV actuator to access the rotating shaft.
By removal of the access cover of the inlet plenum to turn the rotating shaft.
By removal of the vent line and the air/oil separator cover to access the rotating shaft.

Questions.QuestionString: Which components of APU are actuated with fuel medium?
Answers: IGV actuator, Surge Control Valve.
IGV actuator, Bleed Control Valve.
IGV actuator, Bleed Control Valve and Surge Control Valve.

Questions.QuestionString: The APU low fuel pressure switch is:
Answers: Monitored by the ECB and provide notification of low fuel pressure on the ECAM.
Monitored by the ECB and providelow fuel pressure protective shutdown.
Monitored by the ECB andrecorded by CMS.

Questions.QuestionString: What is true regarding the APU shutdown?
Answers: In flight, the protective shutdowns are inhibited even in case of  major failures
During emergency or protective shut down there is 60 seconds cool down period
In normal shutdown the ECB decreases slowly the APU speed for a cooldown period
